thread.title: Man United and Chelsea target Bernardo Silva has interest from 'major European clubs,' claims Monaco chief
thread.title_full: Man United and Chelsea target Bernardo Silva has interest from 'major European clubs,' claims Monaco chief - Mirror Online

author: mirror.co.uk
title: Man United and Chelsea target Bernardo Silva has interest from 'major European clubs,' claims Monaco chief
text:
Man United and Chelsea target Bernardo Silva has interest from 'major European clubs,' claims Monaco chief The 22-year-old has been linked with a £70m move away from Les Rouges et Blancs after a superb season Share Comments By Jack Rathborn 15:57, 20 FEB 2017 Sport Bernardo Silva has attracted interest from some of Europe's biggest clubs (Photo: AFP) football Manchester United and Chelsea target Bernardo Silva has interest from 'major European clubs,' claims Monaco vice-president Vadim Vasilyev.
The Portuguese creative midfielder has been in fine form for the Ligue 1 side this term with the 22-year-old valued at around £70m.
And Vasilyev confirmed that Silva, as well as some of Leonardo Jardim's other top players, have interest from some of Europe's major clubs.
“ Yes, yes. I really don’t want to go into details, but for all our major players," Vasilyev told the Sunday Times. "We have interest from major European clubs.
Silva has thrived under Leonardo Jardim this season (Photo: AFP) Read More Manchester United interested in Monaco star Bernardo Silva “This is not the right time to talk about it. Let’s finish the season and then we look at the project for next season.
“Me, the coach and the players are focused on this season.”
The Red Devils and the Blues will now get a chance to watch Silva close up with Silva ready to feature in the Champions League last 16 tie against Manchester City at the Etihad on Tuesday.
